cs145.kersten.assignment1

Enum CheckersPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CheckersPiece>
      • cs145.kersten.assignment1.CheckersPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CheckersPiece>

    public enum CheckersPiece
extends java.lang.Enum<CheckersPiece>
    CheckersPiece separates the character used to represent a checkers piece in a board file from its visual representation
    Author:
    Andrew Kersten

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      Black
      A black piece on a checkerboard
      Empty
      An empty piece on a checkerboard
      Red
      A red piece on a checkerboard
